don't use clonedvd2 cuz it won't copy protected dvd. just get 'DVDSmith Movie Backup' it allow you copy from dvd full dvd or specific copy parts. it is free like DVD Decrypter.  it can check for bad sector before copy dvd. so try it.  so u can use DVDFab for customize like remove fbi warning, some stupid extras, etc... hope u like my suggestion.
